mapper.select: SELECT fcode, fac_ver_cd, fac_name, address, tel, mname, op_status, cha_rea, reg_dt, note, regi, modi FROM factory WHERE op_status = 'r1' ORDER BY fcode
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO factory (fcode, fac_ver_cd, fac_name, address, tel, mname, op_status, cha_rea, reg_dt, note, regi, modi ) VALUES ( #{fcode}, #{facVerCd}, #{facName}, #{address}, #{tel}, #{mname}, #{opStatus}, #{chaRea}, SYSDATE, #{note}, #{regi}, #{modi} )
INSERT INTO factory_max (max_produ_cd, fcode, fac_ver_cd, mpqty, pcode, prod_ver_cd ) VALUES (#{maxProduCd}, #{fcode}, #{facVerCd}, #{mpqty}, #{pcode}, #{prodVerCd} )
mapper.select: SELECT fcode, fac_ver_cd, fac_name, address, tel, mname, op_status, cha_rea, reg_dt, note, regi, modi FROM ( SELECT fcode, fac_ver_cd, fac_name, address, tel, mname, op_status, cha_rea, reg_dt, note, regi, modi FROM factory WHERE fcode = #{fcode} AND op_status = 'r1' ORDER BY fac_ver_cd DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT f.max_produ_cd, f.fcode, f.fac_ver_cd, f.mpqty, f.pcode, p.prod_ver_cd, p.prod_name FROM factory_max f JOIN ( SELECT p1.pcode, MAX(p1.prod_ver_cd) AS prod_ver_cd FROM product p1 GROUP BY p1.pcode ) latest ON f.pcode = latest.pcode JOIN product p ON p.pcode = latest.pcode AND p.prod_ver_cd = latest.prod_ver_cd WHERE f.fcode = #{fcode} AND f.fac_ver_cd = ( SELECT fac_ver_cd FROM ( SELECT fac_ver_cd FROM factory WHERE fcode = #{fcode} ORDER BY fac_ver_cd DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 )
SELECT fcode, fac_ver_cd, fac_name, address, tel, mname, op_status, cha_rea, reg_dt, note, regi, modi FROM factory WHERE fcode = #{fcode} AND op_status = 'r1'
mapper.update: UPDATE factory SET op_status = 'r2' WHERE fcode = #{fcode} AND op_status = 'r1'
mapper.select: SELECT fcode, fac_ver_cd, fac_name, address, tel, mname, op_status, cha_rea, reg_dt, note, regi, modi FROM factory WHERE fcode = #{fcode} ORDER BY fac_ver_cd DESC
SELECT max_produ_cd, fcode, fac_ver_cd, mpqty, pcode, prod_ver_cd FROM factory_max WHERE fcode = #{fcode} ORDER BY fac_ver_cd DESC

SELECT fm.max_produ_cd, fm.fcode, fm.fac_ver_cd, fm.pcode, fm.prod_ver_cd, fm.mpqty, fm.is_used, p.prod_name FROM factory_max fm JOIN product p ON p.pcode = fm.pcode AND p.prod_ver_cd = fm.prod_ver_cd WHERE fm.fcode = #{fcode} AND fm.fac_ver_cd = #{facVerCd} AND fm.is_used = 'f1' ORDER BY fm.max_produ_cd
